name: Fareez Ahamed
title: ERP Lead Consultant
summary: Polyglot Full Stack Web Developer with good knowledge in multiple platforms such as .Net Core, Node.js, SAP & PHP
Strong Frontend development capabilities with modern JavaScript/Typescript frameworks such as Angular, Vue & React
HTML5 Mobile development capability with Apache Cordova and Ionic framework
Very good understanding on various modern tech stack of different technologies
Founded Laravel Meetup Group in Chennai and conducted meetups successfully

projects.name: Payment Extractor for Bank
points: Payment details from FI Module / HR Payroll is extracted into the Banks own structured file and encrypted and sent to Bank for doing transaction
Created a Node.js project using Yeoman which can generate ABAP programs required for different customers if we select the options
